There are several types of massages that are best for managing anxiety and depression. Here are some of them:

1. Swedish Massage: This type of massage is known for promoting relaxation, reducing muscle tension and increasing circulation. It is perfect for those who suffer from anxiety, depression, and stress.

2. Aromatherapy Massage: This type of massage uses essential oils to promote relaxation and reduce anxiety. It is a great option for those who are looking for a natural and holistic approach to managing their mental health.

3. Deep Tissue Massage: This type of massage is best for those who suffer from chronic muscle tension, pain, and anxiety. It uses deeper pressure to release tension within deep muscle layers.

4. Hot Stone Massage: This type of massage is perfect for those who want to relax and reduce anxiety. It uses heated stones to promote relaxation, increase circulation, and reduce muscle tension.

5. Shiatsu Massage: This type of massage is perfect for those who suffer from anxiety, depression, and stress. It uses finger pressure on specific points of the body to promote relaxation, increase circulation, and reduce muscle tension.

It's important to remember that everyone's needs and preferences are different, so it's best to consult with a massage therapist to determine the best type of massage that will work for you.
